text: The 2020 Peruvian protests were a series of demonstrations caused after the removal of President Mart√≠n Vizcarra. These started on November 9, 2020. Massive protests were seen in many cities of the country, to show their anger at the president's vacancy and reject the inauguration of the president of Congress, Manuel Merino. ==References== 2020 protests Category:November 2020 events Category:2020 protests
title: 2020 Peruvian protests
